summary: This hammer is a result of my need to make a weapon suitable for the titan transformation mod. Link in the full description. This is my first mod and it's the typical god weapon with a twist.
descriptionHtml:
So you were at least interested enough in my mod to click on it. This mod is not for the lore-friendly people nor the immersive crowd. This is purely for fun. This mod adds an item called the Titan Hammer. It's an ebony hammer that deals a ridiculous amount of damage. If you can't one hit dragons you're doing something wrong.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43365/?]This hammer is best paired with the titan form.[/url]


As of May 7th, 2014 it should now be craft-able. Please post a comment or send my a private message if it isn't.

Please endorse if you like this mod, it took literally 8 hours of my life to get the enchantment working and i would really like it if you could take five seconds out of yours to show your appreciation.

This mod is complete and whole. As far as i know there are no bugs and no conflicts. I don't recommend using the hammer indoors as the enchantment is a powerful explosion and launches npc's quite far. I'm not sure what might happen if you use it indoors. Also launching people over city walls is a bad idea from the market standpoint but that's for the player to choose.
author: Michael Tepes
